description: Try our easy to follow German Apple Cake recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: German Apple Cake Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 150Â°C. Grease a 23cm springform cake tin. Line the base and side with a double thickness of baking paper.

Peel, quarter and core apples. Toss apple in a bowl with lemon juice to prevent browning. Using a small knife, thinly slice the rounded side of each quarter lengthways without slicing all the way through. Set aside.
Place flour, sugar, almond meal and baking powder in the bowl of a stand mixer. Add rosemary, butter, eggs, milk and honey. Beat for 6 minutes or until smooth and doubled in size.
Transfer to cake tin. Arrange apples, cut-side up, into the batter snugly, cutting the last few to fit.

Bake for 1 hour, loosely covering with foil halfway, or until the centre of the cake springs back when gently pressed. Allow to cool in tin for 10 minutes, then transfer to a wire rack to cool completely.
To serve, gently heat extra honey in a saucepan over high heat. Drizzle over cake and garnish with extra rosemary. Cut cake into wedges and serve warm.
